name: Bug Bounty Hunter
description: Automated security research pipeline. Discover programs, run recon, organize findings, and track submissions.
author: zinbot

steps.name: Discover Programs
steps.description: Find new and updated bug bounty programs
steps.task: Check {{config.platforms}} for new programs or updated scopes. Filter for programs with bounties >= ${{config.min_bounty}}. Focus on {{config.focus_areas}}. Save interesting programs with scope details.

steps.name: Run Recon
steps.task: For active targets, enumerate subdomains, check for exposed APIs, test CORS configurations, look for information disclosure. Document all findings with evidence. Flag potential vulnerabilities.

steps.name: Write Report
steps.task: For confirmed vulnerabilities, draft a professional report: title, severity, description, steps to reproduce, impact, remediation. Include screenshots/evidence. Format for {{config.platforms}} submission.

steps.name: Track Submissions
steps.description: Monitor report status and follow up
steps.task: Check status of submitted reports on {{config.platforms}}. Follow up on reports pending > 7 days. Track: submitted, triaged, resolved, bounty paid. Calculate total earnings.
